note.p: Roman Catholic priest. MA, Oxford (Merton College). Converted to Catholicism. Attended T. H. Huxley’s lectures and was a friend of St G. J. Mivart. Seceded from the Catholic Church. Married Anne Shannan Caird in 1878.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 May 2013)
London, England, births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 May 2013)
‘Rome’s recruits:’ a list of Protestants who have become Catholics since the Tractarian Movement (London: The Whitehall Review, 1878).
